summary: Implements a unified client for AWS Bedrock embedding services, converting OpenAI‑style embedding requests into the specific payloads required by Amazon Titan (various versions) and Cohere models, handling authentication, invoking the Bedrock /invoke endpoint, and translating the model responses back into a common embedding response format.
business_intent: Allow developers to obtain vector embeddings from Bedrock models through a consistent, OpenAI‑compatible API, simplifying integration, reducing model‑specific handling, and supporting multiple Bedrock embedding providers.
